title: Draw a square, containing cross and X

data.title: Draw a square, containing cross and X
data.statement: Using {{X}}, draw a square of [[size]] height and width, with a cross and an X-shape in it.

data.outputDescription: [[size]] lines, that draw that described square

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Using X, draw a square of size height and width, with a cross and an X-shape in it.
Input
Line 1: integer size
Output
size lines, that draw that described square
Constraints
size is odd
7 ≤ size ≤ 31
Example
Input
13
Output
XXXXXXXXXXXXX
XX    X    XX
X X   X   X X
X  X  X  X  X
X   X X X   X
X    XXX    X
XXXXXXXXXXXXX
X    XXX    X
X   X X X   X
X  X  X  X  X
X X   X   X X
XX    X    XX
XXXXXXXXXXXXX
